body: nit: I'm not a huge fan of comments like this because the expected time for it to be out of date is ~2 days because it's incredibly over specified (it's good for a commit message though!).  Something like "VariableHooks has a dependency on globalContext, which has a dependency on ..." is IMO more appropriate.
